channel.title: Conda on Sarthak Jariwala
channel.description: Recent content in Conda on Sarthak Jariwala

item.title: Create New Environment
item.description: Create a new conda environment # create a new conda environment called ml-ninja conda create --name ml-ninja Create a new environment with packages # create a new environment with python=3.9 and numpy installed conda create --name ml-ninja python=3.9 numpy Verify environment creation conda env list # conda environments: # # base * # ml-ninja
